channel.title: I hate 562.. lol help?
channel.description:
ok so basically... 562's blow -.- lol anyways my problem is im tryna get my server up and running and its just... not working -.- so the server its self is ok Port Status: Open! Port 43594 is open on 50.**.**.*** not adverting here which is why im *ing out the name
server name port owner revision uptime downtime status mypkspot.*****.*** 43594 zack 562 100% 0% Online
so like idk when i try and load my client (source uses khans ip changer but tried more then 1) it will let me connect to 127.0.0.1 but not my servers ip.. any idea why??? there is an exception for it in windows firewall too I load my server first i load my client 2nd thanks in advance!

item.title: I hate 562.. lol help?
item.dc:creator: @patargangstar patargangstar
item.description:
@patargangstar wrote:

[quote=“Saphire`, post:4, topic:383481”]Check your firewall settings aren’t blocking port 43594, or any other port your using to allow connections.

Also, have you portforwarded? There are plenty of tutorials around this forum that show you how to port forward step by step.[/quote][quote=“patargangstar, post:1, topic:383481”]Port Status: Open!
Port 43594 is open on 50...***
there is an exception for it in windows firewall too[/quote]
=p cmon guys help… lol

Read full topic

item.title: I hate 562.. lol help?
item.dc:creator: @Saphire1 Saphire`
item.description:
@Saphire1 wrote:

Check your firewall settings aren’t blocking port 43594, or any other port your using to allow connections.

Also, have you portforwarded? There are plenty of tutorials around this forum that show you how to port forward step by step.

Read full topic

item.description:
@patargangstar wrote:

Saphire`:

You hate 562? So why use it would be my question 0.o

lol well i dont hate 562’s i love them tbh but i hate how many problems ive run into now i got everything working good cept this and its killing me -.-

ok so basically… 562’s blow -.- lol anyways my problem is
im tryna get my server up and running and its just… not working -.-
so the server its self is ok
Port Status: Open!
Port 43594 is open on 50...***
not adverting here which is why im *ing out the name

mypkspot.**. 43594 zack 562 100% 0% Online

so like idk when i try and load my client (source uses khans ip changer but tried more then 1)
it will let me connect to 127.0.0.1 but not my servers ip… any idea why???
there is an exception for it in windows firewall too
I load my server first
i load my client 2nd
